entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -19.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Fort St. John Airport 9:00 PM MST Wednesday 01 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -19.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.8 kPa falling
Visibility: 11.3 km
Humidity: 77 %
Wind Chill: -30
Dewpoint: -22.8°C
Wind: E 21 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 20. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Snow beginning after midnight. Local blowing snow. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Snow ending late in the morning then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow early in the morning. Local amount 2 cm. Wind east 30 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Temperature rising to zero by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending after midnight then mainly cloudy. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming southwest 20 after midnight. Temperature rising to zero by morning. Wind chill minus 16 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 01 February 2023
